statements: SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM NetworkingContacts;
SELECT * FROM NetworkingContacts WHERE contact_id = 3;
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone FROM NetworkingContacts WHERE follow_up_required = TRUE;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email, last_contact_date FROM NetworkingContacts ORDER BY last_contact_date DESC;
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone FROM NetworkingContacts WHERE contact_phone LIKE '%555%' AND contact_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM NetworkingContacts WHERE last_contact_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY contact_name ASC, contact_email DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM NetworkingContacts WHERE follow_up_required = true ORDER BY last_contact_date DESC, contact_name ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT contact_name, contact_phone FROM NetworkingContacts WHERE last_contact_date < '2022-03-15' AND (contact_email LIKE '%@example.com' OR contact_email LIKE '%@test.com') ORDER BY last_contact_date ASC, contact_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone, last_contact_date FROM NetworkingContacts WHERE contact_phone IS NOT NULL AND contact_email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY contact_name ASC, last_contact_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT contact_email FROM NetworkingContacts WHERE contact_name LIKE 'A%' OR contact_name LIKE 'Z%' ORDER BY contact_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT contact_id, contact_name FROM networking_contacts;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM networking_contacts ORDER BY contact_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM follow_up_history WHERE follow_up_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT contact_name, last_contact_date FROM networking_contacts ORDER BY last_contact_date DESC;
SELECT contact_name, follow_up_date, follow_up_result FROM networking_contacts JOIN follow_up_history ON networking_contacts.contact_id = follow_up_history.contact_id;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM networking_contacts ORDER BY contact_name DESC;
SELECT contact_name, last_contact_date FROM networking_contacts WHERE last_contact_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_contact_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM networking_contacts WHERE follow_up_date IS NULL;
SELECT contact_name, follow_up_date FROM networking_contacts JOIN follow_up_history ON networking_contacts.contact_id = follow_up_history.contact_id WHERE follow_up_date < '2022-01-01';

SELECT contact_name, follow_up_description FROM networking_contacts JOIN follow_up_history ON networking_contacts.contact_id = follow_up_history.contact_id WHERE follow_up_result = 'Successful' ORDER BY follow_up_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM contacts;
SELECT contact_id, name, email FROM contacts;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM contacts WHERE company = 'ABC Inc';
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM follow_ups WHERE follow_up_type = 'Reminder' AND status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM contacts ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT contact_id, name, email FROM contacts WHERE company = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT contact_id, name, email, phone_number FROM contacts WHERE last_contacted_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT interactions.interaction_id, interactions.interaction_date, interactions.interaction_type, contacts.name FROM interactions INNER JOIN contacts ON interactions.contact_id = contacts.contact_id;

SELECT c.name, i.interaction_date, i.interaction_type, f.follow_up_date FROM contacts c JOIN interactions i ON c.contact_id = i.contact_id JOIN follow_ups f ON i.interaction_id = f.interaction_id WHERE f.status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM network_contacts ORDER BY full_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT contact_id, full_name, email FROM network_contacts WHERE company_name = 'Acme Corp'
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM network_contacts WHERE last_contact_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT c.full_name, n.note_text FROM network_contacts c JOIN contact_notes n ON c.contact_id = n.contact_id
SELECT f.follow_up_date, f.topic, c.full_name FROM follow_ups f JOIN network_contacts c ON f.contact_id = c.contact_id
SELECT full_name, email FROM network_contacts WHERE last_contact_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY full_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT company_name, phone_number FROM network_contacts WHERE company_name LIKE '%Tech%' ORDER BY company_name DESC

SELECT c.full_name, f.follow_up_date, f.topic FROM network_contacts AS c INNER JOIN follow_ups AS f ON c.contact_id = f.contact_id WHERE f.follow_up_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY f.follow_up_date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT n.full_name, cn.note_text, cn.note_date FROM network_contacts AS n LEFT JOIN contact_notes AS cn ON n.contact_id = cn.contact_id WHERE cn.note_date >= '2022-03-01' AND cn.note_date < '2022-04-01' ORDER BY n.full_name ASC, cn.note_date DESC

SELECT c.full_name, f.topic, cm.method_name FROM network_contacts AS c JOIN follow_ups AS f ON c.contact_id = f.contact_id JOIN communication_methods AS cm ON cm.method_id = 1 WHERE f.outcome = 'Pending' ORDER BY c.full_name DESC
SELECT * FROM contacts;
SELECT name, email FROM contacts WHERE company = 'ABC Inc';
SELECT interaction_date, communication_channel FROM interactions WHERE outcome = 'Positive';
SELECT event_name, location FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT content FROM notes ORDER BY note_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM contacts LIMIT 5;
SELECT contact_id, name, email FROM contacts WHERE company = 'Example Company';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, communication_channel FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT note_id, content, note_date FROM notes WHERE note_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
